title: Lag Free..Finally?
body:
So since Friday I've noticed I haven't gotten any lag spikes lately jumping from like 84 ms to 11450 ms; especially during ARAM. Now I did not notice right away but today, I'm playing and I say to myself wait.. after all these matches I really have not gone over 34-35ms??? which is what my usual ping is what the! 

so like, was there some secret NA server update I'm not aware of or am I just really lucky this weekend lol

replies.body: It sounds like your connection might be unstable.  It might seem really nice now, but it would really suck if it was just a troll and gets worse again.   I highly recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case to help tune up your network to the game server.  I hope that helps!
